# Vigor, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Healing Spells|healing]])

**Level:** [[5th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 5]], [[5th Level Druid Spells|Druid 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 9]], [[BoXM 9th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 9]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Living creature touched

**Duration:** 10 rounds + 1 round/level (max 35 rounds)

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 229

This spell functions like *[[Vigor, Lesser (Spell)|lesser vigor]]*, except as noted here and that it grants fast healing 4.
